lender.loan_because: I can. I also really love pancakes, and motorcycles.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: it makes the world a better place. I love to help people when I can, even if what I have to offer is little.

lender.name: Mike_Phoenix_Az
lender.loan_because: Great way to help deserving people.
lender.occupational_info: I design and install computer systems for companies.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I hope to extend a hand personally ,so those in need will understand others care and are more than willing to offer a chance to help them rise out of poverty. I think there is more dignity for those in need to lend rather than gift.
lender.occupational_info: I have raised two wonderful sons who are currently studying in college and preparing to make their way in this world. I am blessed with a healthy, happy life and would like to pay it forward.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small business, a retail yarn shop.

lender.name: Stef

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: there aren't enough people in the world that get involved with those in need. Its a problem and we are the solution!

lender.name: Marny
lender.loan_because: I am trying to make any difference in the world and people's lives that I can and Kiva makes it easy. I love how entreprenurial and hard working people are all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make their homes, offices or businesses warm, comfortable and functional spaces to live and work.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: I like to supporting under-privileged individuals who are making an effort to better their lives despite their current conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I make unique hand-crafted jewelry

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It's great to reach out to each other...and help each other out whenever we can. "Pay it forward. ' Maybe someday...if I need someone to believe in me and show their faith in my endeavor...someone(s) out there will be there for me...as I hope that I am now there for someone else. "Love one another, right now!'
lender.occupational_info: employed in busy urologist's office. assisting patients to receive best medical care possible from physician, diagnostic, and surgical services and aftercare.,

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: it's one way of making a difference on a limited income.Being a blessing to someone else is my way of being grateful for my own.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired RR worker, by work part time at a funeral parlor. I volunteer at a food bank, and love prayer, music and almost all poetry.I have super kids and grandchildren.

lender.name: Matt

lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor in the Moravian church. I preach and teach the good news of the resurrected Christ

lender.name: Karen & Jack

lender.occupational_info: I have been to some third world countries and I know how blessed I am and I appreciate everything I have.

lender.name: Yael

lender.name: Coralee

lender.occupational_info: I work with patients who have cancer and help them either get better or help them accept that they're dying.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to grow the pie.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.occupational_info: year of service rebuilding houses

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I feel strongly that progress and change is in the hands of each of us as individuals. If I want a better world -- socially, politically, environmentally -- it has to start with me, right here and right now.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupational_info: I help run a certified organic farm, and during the off season, I write for print and radio.

lender.name: DePalatis Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with so much and desire to share that blessing with others, while learning, growing and expanding our own minds and experiences.
lender.occupational_info: Dad is a high school English teacher; Mom is City Director of an international nonprofit organization that assists college-aged international students (Dad is involved too); Kids are in 7th, 5th and 2nd grade (boy-girl-boy).

lender.loan_because: I want to partner with individuals to improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: Doctor and businessman

lender.name: kelsey
lender.loan_because: i have been blessed and i want to share my blessing!

lender.name: peggy
lender.loan_because: When I loan, I feel as if I am loaning to Jesus himself!
lender.occupational_info: Teaching physical and fun games, athletics or sports to grades 1 - 9 boys and girls. My second job is working for Starbucks making and serving coffee at a neighbor store.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: non ho mai visto un modo migliore di impiegare il mio denaro... esageratamente remunerativo, altro che tasso di interesse!!!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people the chance to become self-sufficient. It's like the old saying, "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime."

lender.occupational_info: I am a business analyst for a global consulting firm and Jess works at a mentoring organization for at-risk youth.

lender.name: Sammi

lender.loan_because: we want to give a hand up to someone who works hard to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Kimberly

lender.name: Barbara

lender.loan_because: It is a great way to lend a helping hand.

lender.name: Ron & Carmela
lender.loan_because: we like to help people to help themselves to better their lives
lender.occupational_info: I own an architectural practice with 20 employees; I also own a business manufacturing light-weight concrete blocks and panels for building construction.

lender.occupational_info: We have our own Civil Engineering company.

lender.name: Brian A. Sayrs
lender.loan_because: in order to knock, opportunity needs a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work to strengthen my community by ensuring freedom, security, and opportunity for all, not merely the privileged few.

lender.name: SAVES + AJ
lender.loan_because: We get together for a Christmas party every year and in 2006 we decided that instead of giving each other gifts, we would do something for others. Last year we sent a large care package to a troop over seas with their requested necessities and goodies. For Christmas 07' we chose KIVA because we believe that micro lending is something that anyone can take part in; it's so easy and you can keep on giving time and time again. We plan on reinvesting our loan paybacks with other entrepreneurs on KIVA.

lender.name: Junia
lender.loan_because: Even if my contribution is a distant and small loan, it gives me great satisfaction to be connected to people producing, adding value with their hands and hearts. People being part of the solution, not the problem.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: My parents friends showed me this I thought it was a really good way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I doing my GCSEs

lender.name: Lucy & Brogan
lender.loan_because: We want to add to the world
lender.occupational_info: Lucy helps web sites 'listen' to the people who use them and Brogan makes the world more beautiful.

lender.name: svdave
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference in this world and I enjoy the idea of providing people with the resources they need to fulfill a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Product Manager at a financial services company, with my prroduct focused on medium sized organizations.

lender.name: Fallbrook Women
lender.loan_because: Our Co-presidents wanted a special project to give to and chose Kiva. This is a two year project for our club which we fund through the sale of bead bracelets our members make.
lender.occupational_info: We are community service organization in a small agricultural village. We raise money to give back to Fallbrook.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Siena
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I am 9 years old, live in the United States, and go to school.

lender.occupational_info: Health Care

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to god for all I have. I like to help people to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Finding the best arrangements for travel.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I lend because I want to fulfil God's word in Deut.28:12..."to lend to many nations". My husband and I love giving and we delight in being a blessing to others from the abundance that God has given to us.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others the word of God and help them to improve their quality of life by sharing strategic information for life-changing decisions.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro-loan system, and I believe in these hardworking women! I was single for 11 years, so I have a special appreciation for single mothers.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of a founder of a successful, global company, by helping him to be as efficient as possible, by aiding in his work, and by making his life run smoothly.

lender.name: Rynn
lender.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to help!
lender.occupational_info: I teach politics and geography to high school kids in Georgia.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I hope to help in any way to give back to others a portion of the blessings I have received from others
lender.occupational_info: high tech, I develop test systems for micro processors

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: other people can probably do better things with my money than I can.
lender.occupational_info: I support underserved urban youth as they develop a wide range of skills and make their community stronger.

lender.name: Edie
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea! Such a small sum can make such a big difference. Since people pay it back, if you put in a set amount each month it soon snowballs into something amazing. Those who have should be thankful and make a loan!
lender.occupational_info: I write, edit, design, and produce education and training materials to make learning fun. :)

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: People need help
lender.occupational_info: Fun

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed to be able to.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by the stories I read. I'm grateful to be part of such enterprising people that are improving their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have been an employee all my life. My dream is to have my own business some day.

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: I volunteered during university for the International Rescue Committee in the Ivory Coast. I saw firsthand the beneficial impact micro-loans could have for small businesses and families in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I design power plants that produce electricity from manure and other renewable organic wastes.

lender.name: Dan & Meg
lender.loan_because:
Dan: I'm an entrepreneur and want to see other people run successful businesses that can support their lives.
Meg: I want to help others achieve successful life outcomes by following their own self-determined paths.
lender.occupational_info:
Dan: Creating software that runs on computers
Meg: I provide rehabilitative services to adults living with severe mental illness

lender.name: The Stratton Family
lender.loan_because: Our family has been blessed with more than we need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer manufacturer as a salesman. My wife is a teacher's aide at our children's school.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I am a successful small business owner in the US which I started at the age of 40 after being in corporate marketing for 22 years. I want to help as many women as possible start businesses and empower them to be financially independent and in turn share their good fortune by hiring and supporting other women. By paying it forward we will eventually take care of ourselves as a gender.
lender.occupational_info: Painting, plaster repair, wallpaper removal and decorative finishes and murals. I have 2 other women that work for me. We are preferred vendors on Angie's List.com (an online contractor referral network) and have won the Super Service Award two years in a row!

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not-for-profit, senior advocacy organization.

lender.name: RuTemple
lender.loan_because: I have been given to when in need, and because now I can give.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I believe that person by person, bean by bean, we can all make a difference.

lender.name: Damien and Vanessa
lender.occupation: US Forest Service and High School Counselor

lender.name: Anton
lender.occupation: Development Intern - Creative Growth Art Center
lender.loan_because:
Neither a borrower nor a lender be; / For loan oft loses both itself and friend, / And borrowing dulls the edge of husbandry ("Hamlet" I.iii)
But who the hell ever listened to Polonius?
lender.occupational_info: I develop membership and write grants for the nation's oldest and largest art center for people with developmental disabilities.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others out there who need the funds...

lender.name: Fumiko
lender.loan_because: I would like to support someone to help make a better world !

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help others since I have been helped by others in my life and career
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology Consulting

lender.name: Mark & Demetra
lender.loan_because: It's a way that we can directly help people who, through their hard work and tireless spirit, are so deserving

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to someone in the third world!

lender.name: Bekki
lender.loan_because: With a small effort on my part, I can help someone across the world in a big way.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make computer software that is used during investigations.

lender.name: Sharrie & D
lender.loan_because: We all need help sometimes, it's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: We Lease Temporary Cell Towers on Wheels, Mobile Towers on Wheels (TOW) (COW)

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I live to design for change and am inspired by kiva's attempt to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am an AmeriCorps VISTA Alum in Indiana now working in Non-Profit Technology. VISTA stands for volunteer in service to America. VISTAs work at various not-for-profits building the organizations capacity to fight poverty.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to never have to worry about money or providing for my family, it's the least all of us can do to help relieve the stress of those who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an electrician in a mine.

lender.name: Litsong
lender.loan_because: this is exactly what i had hoped to do. To help those who can use a bit initial push to get on their way to live their dreams
lender.occupational_info: i do what i love with passion and devotion as my gift to the world, and all else follow and flow

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: I love the everything about this concept and the opportunity to, as part of an e-community, really make a global difference! THANKS KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: I review the safety and soundness of farm lending cooperatives to better assure continued availability of credit to US farmers and ranchers.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone else the opportunity for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at MIT Sloan

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want people to have their goals and dreams become a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children aged 11-14 teaching them how to find, evaluate, and use information. I also build and maintain the library collection of books and media. I hope that my work with the children of LGMS helps to mold them into compassionate, globally thinking, environmentally conscious individuals.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: We (Teri, Tom & Sean) are entrepreneurs - we want to support others, like ourselves, who value hard work, caring for our families and making the world a peaceful place to live.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I have the means to help others, and I think it's important to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global manufacturing company, and help my business partners find technological solutions to make their jobs easier and the company run more smoothly.

lender.name: Margo & Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that the way to truly change the world is through people helping people.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: The best help in the world regarding self esteem and becoming self supportive is a job. I remember needing help starting my own business. It makes a HUGE difference to have help.
lender.occupational_info: Caring for the earth; adding beauty to the world; feeding people and creatures; leaving this world a little prettier and better than before.

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Jane
lender.occupational_info: Our laboratory is looking for the causes and ways to prevent heart disease, obesity and diabetes.

lender.name: The Johnson-Steffeys
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Xmas With Krampus
lender.loan_because: I can and Santa loves to give.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: My brother-in-law analog gave me a gift certifcate for Christmas. Best present ever!
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand how the dominant life form on the planet, microbes, make a living.

lender.name: pinkpackrat
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good
lender.occupational_info: I've worked in real estate sales, public relations and journalism-- nowq lucky enough to be retired and in good health and enjoying life.

lender.name: Norman
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others in need , especially if they have responsibilities to family and children
lender.occupational_info: I am a Professor of History at a community college in Long Island, New York, USA.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I don't doubt that "a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world." (Margaret Mead) Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Cultural Anthropology. I am currently writing a dissertation based on fieldwork in Osaka, Japan, where I learned firsthand about the experiences of women who are artists and entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to connect with people around the world and to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Public Library Director

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about humanity and love people, and I believe in the power of a woman entrepreneur... Starting from the ground up... sparking a movement and making a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur, a believer in ideas and following dreams- the same as you. I embrace opportunity.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in another woman's life across the world.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.whereabouts: Tweed Heads West New South Wales

lender.name: lori
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference. i am very lucky to be where I am and would like to share that with someone less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers used in hospitals.

lender.name: Cason
lender.loan_because: I feel microfinance is the easiest way for me to impact the third world.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a multi-state, multi-site electronic medical record installation. I am part of the pharmacy team.

lender.name: christi
lender.loan_because: The world becomes a better place when the people are empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and businesses manage and grow their money.

lender.name: kimberly
lender.loan_because: Giving others the opportunity to grow along with giving them the tools they need. Also giving them the ability to help their community.

lender.name: Terrell
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great tool to help empower those who need it most. The money I am using to loan is what my grandfather gave me for Christmas so I am doing this in his name, William Joesph Terrell (Bill Terrell) and in his wife's name, my grandmother, Jane Stanley Terrell. Grandpa is 83 and lives in Navasota, Tx. My grandmother has passed away. Both are extrodanary people who have taught me so much in life - especially about giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work for The PATH Malaria Vaccine Initiative. We fund and help accelerate the development of malaria vaccines. Most of my work is in Africa.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: I like helping one-on-one.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I like providing the opportunity for people to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Improving the way we do things.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: it helps me connect with greater good.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I support people who show initiative and don't expect a hand out from government. These people are making an effort to improve their circumstances on their own terms instead of becoming dependent on the state. Oppressive state power creates poverty. Free markets are the only way to reduce poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Server operating systems support.

lender.name: Levente
lender.occupational_info: studying psychology

lender.name: Kaston
lender.loan_because: Giving makes the world go round. We are not, in reality, separated.
lender.occupational_info: I read many books and write many papers. My school is one of the nation's most prestigious and I hope to use the resulting benefits to help others across the globe. I especially want to affect change in the Asian area when I live there.

lender.name: joshua
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am working as a survival guide at a wilderness therapy program

lender.name: Kelsey Madison
lender.loan_because: I can=)

lender.name: Julien St-Laurent
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I develop transactional websites for a variety of clients.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: Hard work and the entreprenurial spirit should be rewarded

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I want to be a part of a greater good.

lender.name: Kevin & Julie
lender.loan_because: We want to help.

lender.name: Chandra
lender.loan_because: After spending time in and enjoying the culture and people in both Mexico and Peru, I have been looking for an organization like this. Offering this support makes an immediate impact in someone's quality of life. It allows children to remain in school and gives their parents the opportunity to experience a sense of accomplishment in their trade. Having the ability to support your family strengthens people's feeling of pride and hope for their future. This cooperative is a fantastic idea!
lender.occupational_info:
I am back in school getting my third degree - this one in Outdoor Recreation Leadership with a minor in Spanish so that I may share with many my curiosity and drive for self-empowerment through the outdoors.
I love to be in service to others, both by giving my time and financial support, if needed. I spend every moment I can trying to improve the world inch by inch - by my actions, my choices and my words.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: If I (we) don't, who will?
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes for their families.

lender.name: Gie
lender.loan_because: I believe citizens of this world can achieve amazing things, given the right resources, opportunity and support. Helping and caring for each other locally and globally is a moral imperative.
lender.occupational_info: I work in semiconductor technology development. I help develop computer chip design.

lender.name: Topping Family
lender.loan_because: We like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of five.

lender.name: Marv
lender.loan_because: i believe in the ability of an entrepenure to improve to improve his or her circumstances and thereby improve the well being of their family and community.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a forester and I plan the maintenace and care of forests for private land owners. This requires an understanding of all of the impacts a forest has on the other plants, animals and people that are asociated with the forest. It requires a long term outlook and it takes many years to see the results of your work.
Our forests grow slowly in Canada but I have been doing this work for 30 years and am now seeing satisfying results.

lender.name: Quinn
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great opportunity for entrepreneurs, and I believe a little can go a long way if everyone contributes.
lender.occupational_info: I recently graduated from college and am looking to teach and also go into the entertainment industry.

lender.name: mary and josh
lender.loan_because: i believe inn Kiva's philosophy of lending.
lender.occupational_info: I'm very fortunate to stay home with my 2, 4, and 6 year old boys while my husband works.

lender.name: Michael Powell
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.name: Celeste
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed because I have access to everything I need to live a healthy, comfortable life. But I know life isn't like this for most people in the world. I loan because I want to help other people build a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of English to speakers of other languages. I recently returned from 2 years of volunteer service in Ukraine, where I lived in a small town teaching English to children at a secondary school.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving people the means to help themselves will help create a better economy, self sufficiency, and community pride.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer

lender.name: Wilfredo
lender.loan_because: I want to develop the world through business.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: There are people out in the world less fortunate than my family and I.Everybody in the world has needed a hand or some help at least once in there life time. So why would you not help out a friend, stranger, or some one asking for help. It is just the right thing to do for one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mechanic I fix and repair all sorts of equipment.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: A very small gesture makes a very great difference.

lender.name: Nellie
lender.loan_because: It's a win-win situation. Someone gets a helping hand. I feel good about passing along support that i've received form others when I was in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a travel company that flies people all over the world to experience other cultures (Togo, Rwanda, Galapagos to name a few) My job is to produce the catalogs and marketing materials that offer these trips.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people have a chance to work for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Print advertising.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Heidi and Chris
lender.loan_because: We want to see things improve for the under-privileged

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: there are so many people in this world that need the money more than i do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in school to be an actor

lender.name: Clarence
lender.loan_because: It helps people and I like the way KIVA works.

lender.name: roberto
lender.loan_because: Seems the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Marketing consultant, teacher, journalist

lender.name: sara
lender.occupational_info: College Student

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I can. I love that I can help someone out across the world that needs just a little help, and with kiva I can just keep recycling that! :D
lender.occupational_info:
I work for a school photography co. I drive all over my state everyday and take photos of kids, sports & other events.
Privately I take on some small business in photography as well, doing mostly senior portraits and weddings!
